nfo.data

Class ArgumentParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • nfo.data.ArgumentParser

  • public class ArgumentParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parse the arguments given to the program.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rio Alexandre

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Argument[] arguments
      List of all the available arguments.

      Self reference.

      private ArgumentParser()
      Create a new argument parser with no argument to parse.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ArgumentParser getInstance()
        Get the instance of the ArgumentParser, if it doesn't exist a new instance is created.
        Returns:
        The instance of the ArgumentParser.

      • setArguments

        public boolean setArguments(java.lang.String[] arguments)
        Set the list of arguments.
        Parameters:
        arguments - List of all the arguments to parse.
        Returns:
        True if everything went well, false in any other case.

      • process

        private void process(int argumentID,
           java.lang.String[] options)
        Process the action corresponding to the argument ID.
        Parameters:
        argumentID - Unique ID of an argument.
        options - List of options for the argument ID, no verification are done here, see setArguements for the number of option expected.

      • getArgument

        protected Argument getArgument(java.lang.String argumentName)
        Get the Argument instance of an argument based on an alias.
        Parameters:
        argumentName - Argument name to look for.
        Returns:
        The instance of the argument if the alias exists, null in other case.
